boardgame.name: Fields of Green
Le Temps des Moissons
boardgame.description: Fields of Green takes place in the second half of the 20th century. Players take the role of farm owners trying to expand their property and business. By adding fields, livestock and facilities, they build an economic engine that will bring them closer to victory._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Fields of Green, inspired by Among the Stars, is played over four rounds (years) during which players draft cards and add them to their ever-expanding farms. At the end of each year comes the harvest season when they must water their fields, feed their livestock, and pay maintenance costs in order to receive valuable resources that will allow them to further expand in the next year._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Through various means, player eventually convert their wealth to victory points, and the player who gathers the most by the end of the fourth year wins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: Game: Fields Of Green (Artipia) Kickstarter version with all stretch goals + special cloth bag Condition: new in shrinkwrap Language: English Crop circle also available! Thanks in advance for ordering! See below for information on shipping, payment _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; cancellation. Payment: Bank transfer to an EU bank account using IBAN/BIC in advance (normally free of charge if your bank account is nominated in EURO) Paypal (add 3,- Euro to cover the fees. That should be the first choice for non-EU customers.) Pick up the game at my game store (no shipping cost) Shipping: always insured and with tracking Germany: 5,99€ for the first item card games or smaller boxes might be cheaper (please contact me beforehand) EU: 13,99€ up to 2kg 15,99€ up to 5kg 20,99€ up to 10kg Rest of the world: Please contact me before purchasing an item to clarify the shipping costs. I can offer discounts on shipping if multiple marketplace purchases are made. Returns and Cancellation: You may cancel your order without giving any reasons within 14 days after placing your order. Please contact spieleberatung@t-online.de and I will attempt to resolve the matter. Unopened copies of the game that are no longer wanted can be returned, but there is a 10% restocking fee payable of the item price and the buyer is responsible for the return shipping costs. Spieleberatung Frank Solnitzky Hainbuchenweg 1 36381 Schlüchtern Germany +49-06661-9115039 frank@spieleberatung.com
Kickstarter Edition There may be small amounts of typical box wear, but contents are 100% U.K. Shipping using MyHermes. Contact me for European prices
English Like new, only played once - from a smoke free home Shipping within Gemany 4.69 Euro - please ask for international quotations Paypal is accepted if buyer pays fees

Note: This is the Kickstarter copy and there have been many posts that the inside of the actual game box isn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t a pretty sight, but that in most cases the actual game pieces are perfectly fine. As this has not been opened I cannot tell you whether this is the case or not. Buyer assumes risk of the contents within the game (ie: no returns), but I will help remedy via the kickstarter campaign if pieces are missing or damaged to get replacements shipped to you. Buyer pays Shipping, $10 maximum.
Selling Fields of Green KS version with all Stretch Goals. Item is brand new in shrink wrap. Buyer pays for shipping costs. Please feel free to PM me to check on the estimated costs. Thank you.
Shipping is from 43224. I will gladly combine shipping on multiple items purchased.
For user jopeters only!! Sale is for feedback purposes and is already completed. Please do not purchase if you are not him.

Kickstarter edition! Everything is in great condition and I worked very carefully to punch everything out, based on the Kickstarter feedback. Only played the game once and it just didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t connect for my game group. I taped/fixed the only issue which was a little rip on the insert which apparently happened to every Kickstarter delivery. Shipping looks to be in the $7-$8 range but can provide a quote if needed.
Included the KS expansion. Opened but unplayed! Will ship via Usps flat rate or regional depending on price.

This sale has been auto-generated for the auction: [geekurl=/geeklist/221157/item/5175862#5175862]Item for Geeklist _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;The Great Game Purge 2017 - CONUS Only, End 2/5_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; [/geekurl] Please do not purchase if you didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t win this auction.

Fields of Green is a great game about resource management and card drafting. This is the unique kickstarter edition which includes all of the stretch goals including the burlap bag, additional cards, and mini expansion. During the shipping process, the box insert was damaged with a small hole approximately 2 in x 2 in. Also, some of the small pieces were torn during the punch out process, but the damage is minimal and does not affect game play. The cards are in perfect condition and the art is beautiful. This game comes from a smoke-free, pet-free home and the only reason it is being sold is because my wife and I prefer the heavies. Also, the cards have all been sleeved in premium 90 micron cards sleeves and extra sleeves will come with the game. The buyer will need to cover shipping.
English Like new, unplayed! - from a smoke free home Shipping within Gemany 4.69 Euro - please ask for international quotations Paypal is accepted if buyer pays fees
Kickstarter edition
